item.description:
$tress is costing our economy billions each year and it is affecting the health and well-being of every one of us.
At our April meeting Cheryl Roby will educate us on the cost of stress to the economy, the medical care system and our personal health and well-being. She will then offer tips and tools for you to use to mitigate the affects of stress in your life. This part of the meeting will be experiential, so come prepared to leave your stress behind!

Cheryl is using her training in the mind/body connection to educate others on the effects of stress on health. She is a graduate of the Institute of Healing Arts and Sciences, a Reiki Master Teacher, a certified YogaDance instructor and the author of The Roby Chart: Where Beliefs Affect Your Anatomy.

Come and bring a friend. Remember, the first meeting is free.
item.name: Your money and your life--Stress affects both!
